subject: Baseball
Cyberattacks and Hackers
lead_paragraph: A slip-up led investigators to trace a breach of the Astros’ database to a home used by Cardinals employees, but identifying the intruder or intruders is more of a challenge.
snippet: A slip-up led investigators to trace a breach of the Astros’ database to a home used by Cardinals employees, but identifying the intruder or intruders is more of a challenge.
